data.comment: The match is underway at Willem II Stadion.
Leeroy Owusu (Willem II) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 20, Idrissa Toure is booked for the away team.
Goal! Willem II have got their heads in front thanks to a Che Nunnely strike.
Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Marc Nagtegaal has blown to start the second-half.
Goal! Lois Openda equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 57, Sondre Tronstad with an assist there.
Vitesse make their first substitution with Thomas Bruns replacing Sondre Tronstad.
Thomas Buitink is replacing Idrissa Toure for the away team.
In the minute 62, Willem II's Jordens Peters has been booked in Tilburg.
Goal! Armando Broja gives Vitesse a 1-2 lead.
That's a fine assist from Million Manhoef.
In the minute 68, The home team replace Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye with Gorkem Saglam.
Thomas Letsch (Vitesse) is making a third substitution, with Tomas Hajek replacing Million Manhoef.
Vangelis Pavlidis (Willem II) has received a yellow card from Marc Nagtegaal.
In the minute 75, John Yeboah is on a sub for Mats Kohlert for Willem II.
Vitesse make their fourth substitution with Oussama Darfalou replacing Armando Broja.
Patrick Vroegh is replacing Lois Openda for Vitesse at Willem II Stadion.
In the minute 85, Patrick Vroegh puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-3.
Great play from Thomas Buitink to set up the goal.
Marc Nagtegaal blows to end the match. The final score is 1-3.
Riechedly Bazoer (Vitesse) gets a yellow card.
